text: The Out-of-Towners is a 1999 American comedy movie directed by Sam Weisman and is a remake of the 1970 movie of the same name written by Neil Simon. It stars Steve Martin, Goldie Hawn and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. == Other websites == * * * Category:1999 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: The Out-of-Towners (1999 movie)
